review: So I have had the Amazon Fire TV for about three weeks now and at first it was amazing and ran like a dream. As of late, it has slowed way down and gets horrible jitters when I am in the Netflix App. I really wanted to love it because we already have Apple TV and weren't very impressed with the interface. As far as the interface and look, Amazon Fire takes the cake but as far as performance Apple TV still seems to be number one our household. Then again, I have always been disappointed with Android based technology because it works beautifully for a little while and than takes a huge dump. Maybe an update would help, who knows. Review updates after a few months.
author: gabbyj
